name: Saed Yousef
tagline: Software Engineer | Backend Specialist | Development Team Lead

about.text: As a Development Team Lead with over 7 years of experience, I specialize in backend technologies, primarily PHP. My expertise lies in building robust web applications, integrating third-party systems, and architecting RESTful APIs. I emphasize clean, maintainable code and best practices while guiding my team to deliver high-quality solutions. With a strong foundation in DevOps, I automate workflows, manage infrastructure, and ensure efficient deployments. I'm passionate about leveraging technology to create scalable solutions and always open to new challenges.

experience.description: Lead a team of engineers delivering scalable PHP services. Set architecture standards, perform code reviews, and coordinate DevOps automation to ensure smooth releases.
responsibilities: Manage a team of developers and coordinate sprint planning.
Review code and enforce best practices for maintainable PHP.
Architect RESTful APIs and system integrations.
Drive automation and deployment processes.

experience.description: Designed and implemented complex backend features. Mentored teammates, contributed to infrastructure improvements, and collaborated on system design and integrations.
responsibilities: Build and optimize backend services.
Lead architecture discussions and integrations.
Mentor developers through code reviews and pair programming.
Ensure reliable deployments using Docker and Kubernetes.

experience.description: Improved backend systems and adopted DevOps practices. Managed infrastructure using Docker and Kubernetes on AWS.
responsibilities: Implement backend logic and manage infrastructure.
Establish CI/CD pipelines.
Utilize Laravel, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and REST APIs.

experience.description: Refactored existing APIs and improved JSON data structures while collaborating with an agile remote team.
responsibilities: Refactor and review JSON-based APIs.
Collaborate in an agile, remote-first team.
Ensure documentation and test coverage.

experience.description: Delivered backend services for clients, focusing on API design, integrations, and independent project management.
responsibilities: Design and integrate APIs for clients.
Communicate project scope and deliver milestones.
Maintain reliability with automated testing.

experience.description: Developed full-stack applications using PHP and AWS, managing the entire lifecycle from planning to deployment.
responsibilities: Build full-stack applications.
Integrate PHP apps with AWS using best practices.
Implement design patterns and maintainable code.

experience.description: Developed and maintained core systems and APIs. Built SDKs for delivery integrations, deployed fixes, and provided client support and onboarding.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain core systems and APIs.
Build SDKs and deploy fixes.
Provide client support and onboarding.
Train new team members.

experience.description: Led API development and integrations across multiple projects. Managed payment gateways and infrastructure while coordinating releases and mentoring junior developers.
responsibilities: Lead backend API development and system integration.
Set up and maintain payment gateways.
Coordinate projects and train junior developers.
Manage servers and environments.
